text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (…Today is… the last day of the Summer Training Camp. Did… I even learn anything substantial? Was I able to get stronger?.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Trainer is… always praising me and…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (Hearing him say that does make me happy, but the thing is… I can't say I can take his praise with my head held high. How would I even—)

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Ah, hey over here! There's a festival today! They just put a flier on the bulletin board!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Wha!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: Whoa, we have to go!! We worked hard on this training camp, I wonder if my trainer will treat me as a reward～

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …This is the answer!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (In order to change myself… I need to take that first step. I need to be brave… and go towards the starting line! It starts with me!)
Stalls lined the streets, with the bright lamps and music enveloping the surroundings. And I can feel the mood rising with the sound of taiko drums in the distance.
choice_data_list: Looks fun, thanks for inviting me!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
N-not at all! Um… I guess, you're welcome. 
I should be the one… saying thank you…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Haaa. I invited them, I actually invited them, and yet! What should we do? I wonder what I can do so they can enjoy themselves.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (…No! Since it's me, I know how to have fun at a festival! Just like the other children, today will be tons of fun!)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: T-trainer, let's go play… together! Ah, look! The crowd at that stall cleared up.
—Katanuki. Since I broke mine in half a while ago, I was watching Cheval meticulously chip away at the etched image.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Hm… Almost… 
…Ah!?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm sorry trainer! 
I got too invested in the game, something like this must be boring to you—
choice_data_list: That concentration is a strong point!
That concentration is a strong point!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Aah. U-up next is… something that will get our blood pumping! Something so exciting that it'll get our hearts racing!

— String Pulling Lottery. 
Even though the prizes were aimed at children, it certainly gave that blood pumping feeling.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: N-now then! Can you please tell me what item you want!? I will… do my best to get that item!
choice_data_list: Alright, then that box of candy there…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Got it! Hmm… there's a couple strings to pull from… this string is different in the back. And this one here is a bit longer than the rest…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: And there's also… this one has a stiffer feeling to it, and that one is…

text_block_list.name: Man Running the Lottery
text_block_list.text: Ha ha ha! Lil' missy, for something like this you trust in your gut and go for it! There's a line formin' behind ya, so I gotta ask ya to pull one now!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? Ah… um, s-sorry! 
T-then I'll pull this one—

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (I didn't get… the box of candy…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(Ah… why am I like this? 
…I look totally lame…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (…Even after finding the courage to take the lead, this is all it amounts to.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (Trainer is probably… no they're definitely disappointed in me. I knew it, compared to my sisters I—)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Huh?
When I recalled how serious Cheval was just a moment ago, I couldn't help but break out into a laugh.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
T-trainer? What's wrong? 
A-are you finally fed up with me!?
After apologizing for laughing like that, I told her that it was just like her to act that serious. I had fun and enjoyed myself.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: You… enjoyed that?
I nodded. I told her that she was doing everything so seriously all for my sake.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Ah…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (Trainer is… someone who always accepts who I am… even though I don't shine whatsoever.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (…Even though you're from the "other side"…you still stand right by me.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Trainer, someday you might… come to regret this.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
I was… the one to choose you. 
And yet, you still accepted it…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: There's plenty of sparkling uma musumes and they all… shine much brighter than me.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: I knew that… I knew that but… I… I couldn't…
Her voice was started to quiver in fear. I needed to calm her down, it was clear she had a lot of anxiety weighing on her. So I—
choice_data_list: I wouldn't say that's quite the case.

text_block_list.text: I shot down what she was saying.
choice_data_list: I'm the one that chose you.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Hah—
That's the reason why I had no regrets.
I'm glad I chose her. Every time I saw Cheval, those words would pop into my mind. Seeing her work hard, every single day, only made me more confident in those words.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …T-Trainer…
(…I… couldn't love myself, the me that always hung her head low.)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (—And yet, in their eyes, I was "something", something that shines and sparkled.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: ( Ah… If that's the case, I'd need to—)
choice_data_list: Alright, let's give it our all back at Tracen!

text_block_list.text:
("Trainer who believes in me"… 
I want to… believe in them too)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…Understood, trainer. 
I will… give it my all.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (And then… someday, I want to ask them.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(Just what were you able to see in me… 
In those eyes of yours?)
